details.arabic_diacless: ربنا تقبل منا ‌ؕانك انت السميع العليم
details.arabic: رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلۡ مِنَّا ‌ؕاِنَّكَ اَنۡتَ السَّمِيۡعُ الۡعَلِيۡمُ
details.transliteration: Rabbana taqabbal minna innaka antas Sameeaul Aleem
details.translations: Our Lord, accept [this] from us. Indeed You are the Hearing, the Knowing.

details.arabic_diacless: ربنا واجعلنا مسلمين لـك ومن ذريتنآ امة مسلمة لك وارنا مناسكنا وتب علينا ۚ انك انت التواب الرحيم
details.arabic: رَبَّنَا وَاجۡعَلۡنَا مُسۡلِمَيۡنِ لَـكَ وَمِنۡ ذُرِّيَّتِنَآ اُمَّةً مُّسۡلِمَةً لَّكَ وَاَرِنَا مَنَاسِكَنَا وَتُبۡ عَلَيۡنَا ۚ اِنَّكَ اَنۡتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيۡمُ
details.transliteration: Rabbana wa-j'alna Muslimayni laka wa min Dhurriyatina 'Ummatan Muslimatan laka wa 'Arina Manasikana wa tub 'alayna 'innaka 'antat-Tawwabu-Raheem
details.translations: Our Lord, and make us Muslims [in submission] to You and from our descendants a Muslim nation [in submission] to You. And show us our rites and accept our repentance. Indeed, You are the Accepting of repentance, the Merciful.

pageTitle: Seeking acceptance of deeds &  becoming a devout muslim [2:127-128]
